name: Friday Heist
description:
Friday Heist is a game developed by a team of students on their second semester of the Game Design course in UAM, São Paulo Brazil.

The challenge for this semester was to create a game that is a redesign of classic arcades games from late 70s/early 80s.

The team decided to go with reimagining the Atari classic "Elevator Action" on a more modern, faster gameplay.
